main event: A patrolman observed a bright white light object near the airport in Sacramento, California, on January 7, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a silver dollar held at arm's length., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds., The object disappeared at the same rate of speed it appeared to travel., The object was moving straight down and burned up high in the sky., Weather conditions included high thin scattered clouds with clear visibility.
witness description: Mr. William Felger, Police Department patrolman
